cURL

Python

Copy

```
curl --request POST \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/integrations/hooks \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "app_id": 1,
  "inbox_id": 1,
  "status": 1,
  "settings": {}
}'
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#body-app-id)

app\_id

integer

The ID of app for which integration hook is being created

Example:

`1`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#body-inbox-id)

inbox\_id

integer

The inbox ID, if the hook is an inbox hook

Example:

`1`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#body-status)

status

integer

The status of the integration (0 for inactive, 1 for active)

Example:

`1`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#body-settings)

settings

object

The settings required by the integration

Example:

```
{}
```

#### Response

200

200401

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#response-id)

id

string

The ID of the integration hook

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#response-app-id)

app\_id

string

The ID of the integration app

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#response-inbox-id)

inbox\_id

string

Inbox ID if its an Inbox integration

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#response-account-id)

account\_id

string

Account ID of the integration

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#response-status)

status

boolean

Whether the integration hook is enabled for the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#response-hook-type)

hook\_type

boolean

Whether its an account or inbox integration hook

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/integrations/create-an-integration-hook#response-settings)

settings

object

The associated settings for the integration
